adjectives.description: carriageable (comparative more carriageable, superlative most carriageable)

entries.meaning: Capable of being conveyed in carriages.

examples: Except, however, between the lower Shire and Blantyre-Zomba, one is not encouraged to spend hundreds of pounds on the making of a carriageable road, because of the presence, in various tracts, of the tsetse fly,  […]
